title: Friend's
content:
Wt happened to F's, whenever I see my f friends in camp, I say hi/hello just because our bond won't get thinner.

But I noticed them They even after seeing me they won't even say a hi.

Is it better to move on from this weird ðŸŽ®?.

comments.body: Next time whenever you see them, don't break eye contact to assert dominance. Stare at their soles
